function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of a questionnaire adapted from another source may lead to cultural and contextual biases in the responses, impacting data quality and validity.","Impact":"Inaccurate data may lead to ineffective policies and interventions for disease control and prevention.","Mitigation":"Conducting additional validation studies to ensure the questionnaire's applicability to the Indonesian context and culture.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software for validating questionnaire responses.","People":"Indonesian residents participating in the survey.","Owner":"Research team and health authorities."}]}
